scripts.build: npm run deploy && npm run setContractRoyalties eqmusic && npm run genAcct1 && npm run genAcct2 && npm run genAcct3 && npm run createProfileRapta && npm run createProfileEQKeys && npm run seed1 && npm run seed2
scripts.profiles: npm run createProfile1 && npm run createProfile2
scripts.mintAll: flow transactions build ./txn.mintAll.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer $npm_config_signer --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save txMintNFT1
scripts.mintNFT: flow transactions build ./txn.mintNFT.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer $npm_config_signer --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save txMintNFT1
scripts.mintSign: flow transactions sign txMintNFT1 --signer $npm_config_signer --filter payload --save txMintNFT2 && flow transactions sign txMintNFT2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save txMintNFT3 && flow transactions send-signed txMintNFT3
scripts.createProfileRapta1: flow transactions build ./txn.createProfile1.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer rapta --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save txCreateProfileRapta1
scripts.createProfileRapta2: flow transactions sign txCreateProfileRapta1 --signer rapta --filter payload --save txCreateProfileRapta2
scripts.createProfileRapta3: flow transactions sign txCreateProfileRapta2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save txCreateProfileRapta3
scripts.createProfileRapta: npm run createProfileRapta1 && npm run createProfileRapta2 && npm run createProfileRapta3 && flow transactions send-signed txCreateProfileRapta3
scripts.createProfileEQKeys1: flow transactions build ./txn.createProfile2.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer eqkeys --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save txCreateProfileEQKeys1
scripts.createProfileEQKeys2: flow transactions sign txCreateProfileEQKeys1 --signer eqkeys --filter payload --save txCreateProfileEQKeys2
scripts.createProfileEQKeys3: flow transactions sign txCreateProfileEQKeys2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save txCreateProfileEQKeys3
scripts.createProfileEQKeys: npm run createProfileEQKeys1 && npm run createProfileEQKeys2 && npm run createProfileEQKeys3 && flow transactions send-signed txCreateProfileEQKeys3
